creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
If you create a bean which sets its class path using
System.setProperty("java.class.path")

and then try and use the ResourceBundle.getBundle method it cant find the required classes/files.

The class path is being set OK, but it just doesnt seem to be used.

If the classpath is set prior to starting the web server, everythng works fine.

Changes to the java.class.path property don't have any effect once the VM is 
running.
